categories.def: a piece of furniture having a smooth flat top that is usually supported by one or more vertical legs
categories.name: table

categories.def: a covering spread over a dining table
categories.name: tablecloth

categories.def: a label associated with something for the purpose of identification or information
categories.name: tag

categories.def: an enclosed armored military vehicle; has a cannon and moves on caterpillar treads
categories.name: army_tank

categories.def: a tight-fitting sleeveless shirt with wide shoulder straps and low neck and no front opening
categories.name: tank_top_(clothing)

categories.def: a long thin piece of cloth or paper as used for binding or fastening
categories.name: tape_(sticky_cloth_or_paper)

categories.def: measuring instrument consisting of a narrow strip (cloth or metal) marked in inches or centimeters and used for measuring lengths
categories.name: tape_measure

categories.def: kettle for boiling water to make tea
categories.name: teakettle

categories.def: pot for brewing tea; usually has a spout and handle
categories.name: teapot

categories.def: electronic device for communicating by voice over long distances
categories.name: telephone

categories.def: an electronic device that receives television signals and displays them on a screen
categories.name: television_set

categories.def: a racket used to play tennis
categories.name: tennis_racket

categories.def: vacuum flask that preserves temperature of hot or cold drinks
categories.name: thermos_bottle

categories.def: a fine cord of twisted fibers (of cotton or silk or wool or nylon etc.) used in sewing and weaving
categories.name: thread

categories.def: large feline of forests in most of Asia having a tawny coat with black stripes
categories.name: tiger

categories.def: foil made of tin or an alloy of tin and lead
categories.name: tinfoil

categories.def: a soft thin (usually translucent) paper
categories.name: tissue_paper

categories.def: a kitchen appliance (usually electric) for toasting bread
categories.name: toaster

categories.def: any of various devices for taking hold of objects; usually have two hinged legs with handles above and pointed hooks below
categories.name: tongs

categories.def: a box or chest or cabinet for holding hand tools
categories.name: toolbox

categories.def: small brush; has long handle; used to clean teeth

categories.def: a dentifrice in the form of a paste
categories.name: toothpaste

categories.def: pick consisting of a small strip of wood or plastic; used to pick food from between the teeth
categories.name: toothpick

categories.def: a truck equipped to hoist and pull wrecked cars (or to remove cars from no-parking zones)
categories.name: tow_truck

categories.def: a rectangular piece of absorbent cloth (or paper) for drying or wiping
categories.name: towel

categories.def: a device regarded as providing amusement
categories.name: toy

categories.def: a wheeled vehicle with large wheels; used in farming and other applications
categories.name: tractor_(farm_equipment)

categories.def: a device to control vehicle traffic often consisting of three or more lights
categories.name: traffic_light

categories.def: a lightweight motorcycle equipped with rugged tires and suspension for off-road use
categories.name: dirt_bike

categories.def: a truck consisting of a tractor and trailer together
categories.name: trailer_truck

categories.def: public or private transport provided by a line of railway cars coupled together and drawn by a locomotive
categories.name: train_(railroad_vehicle)

categories.def: an open receptacle for holding or displaying or serving articles or food
categories.name: tray

categories.def: a garment extending from the waist to the knee or ankle, covering each leg separately
categories.name: trousers

categories.def: an automotive vehicle suitable for hauling
categories.name: truck

categories.def: any of various aquatic and land reptiles having a bony shell and flipper-like limbs for swimming
categories.name: turtle

categories.def: a lightweight handheld collapsible canopy
categories.name: umbrella

categories.def: an electrical home appliance that cleans by suction
categories.name: vacuum_cleaner

categories.def: bowed stringed instrument that is the highest member of the violin family
categories.name: violin

categories.def: an inflated ball used in playing volleyball
categories.name: volleyball

categories.def: a kitchen appliance for baking waffles
categories.name: waffle_iron

categories.def: a stick carried in the hand for support in walking
categories.name: walking_stick

merged.def: a stick that people can lean on to help them walk
merged.name: walking_cane

categories.def: a pocket-size case for holding papers and paper money
categories.name: wallet

categories.def: a tall piece of furniture that provides storage space for clothes; has a door and rails or hooks for hanging clothes
categories.name: wardrobe

categories.def: a home appliance for washing clothes and linens automatically
categories.name: automatic_washer

categories.def: a small, portable timepiece
categories.name: watch

categories.def: a bottle for holding water
categories.name: water_bottle

categories.def: a faucet for drawing water from a pipe or cask
categories.name: water_faucet

categories.def: a filter to remove impurities from the water supply
categories.name: water_filter

categories.def: a jug that holds water
categories.name: water_jug

categories.def: large oblong or roundish melon with a hard green rind and sweet watery red or occasionally yellowish pulp
categories.name: watermelon

categories.def: a circular frame with spokes (or a solid disc) that can rotate on a shaft or axle
categories.name: wheel

categories.def: a movable chair mounted on large wheels
categories.name: wheelchair

categories.def: a decorative arrangement of pieces of metal or glass or pottery that hang together loosely so the wind can cause them to tinkle
categories.name: wind_chime

categories.def: a bottle for holding wine
categories.name: wine_bottle

categories.def: a glass that has a stem and in which wine is served

categories.def: a spoon made of wood
categories.name: wooden_spoon

categories.name: yacht

categories.def: any of several fleet black-and-white striped African equines
